sentence: The  day  before,  an  Israeli  airstrike  had  hit  her  cousin's  house,  killing  his  wife,  mother  and  children.

According  to  the  Ministry  of  Health  in  Gaza  on  Wednesday,  more  than  3,470  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  Israel  began  its  bombardment  in  response  to  the  attack  by  the  militant  group  Hamas  on  October  7.
She  knows  of  families  where  both  parents  were  killed  in  Israeli  airstrikes,  and  only  the  children  survived.
